instance.context: speculations about the outcome of the election ;

someone who builds cheap buildings out of poor materials on
speculation for a quick profit ;

someone who emphasizes observable facts and excludes metaphysical
speculation about origins or ultimate causes ;

a person given to fanciful
speculations and enthusiasms with little regard for what is actually possible ;

German naturalist whose
speculations that plants and animals are made_up of tiny living infusoria led to the cell_theory ;
